sentences.en: A pressure - sensitive effect affects unfavorably the production performance of fractured low - permeability reservoirs with horizontal fractures.
sentences.cn: 压敏效应对含水平裂缝的低渗透油藏开发具有重要影响.

sentences.en: Brad was being purposely bumpkinish reacting unfavorably to Boylan's mannered elegance.
sentences.cn: 勃雷德有意乡里乡气的,来对付博伊兰矫揉造作的高雅.

sentences.en: I never compare my child unfavorably to other children.
sentences.cn: 从来不对孩子说,他比别的孩子差.

sentences.en: In this respect it compares unfavorably with both natural stone and steel.
sentences.cn: 这方面混凝土不如天然岩石和钢材.

sentences.en: Negotiating with buyer as instruct however afraid unconvincing as your price compare unfavorably faith others.
sentences.cn: 已按照指示和买方交涉,但贵公司价格高于其他公司,恐怕无法达成.

sentences.en: Tom wanted to kick back at the people who had written so unfavorably about his new book in the newspapers.
sentences.cn: 对那些在报纸上批评他的新书的人,汤姆打算予以还击.

sentences.en: We've heard parents comment unfavorably about long - haired toy animals.
sentences.cn: 对于长毛型的玩具动物,我们听到有些家长们评语不佳.

sentences.en: Your actions contrast unfavorably with your principles.
sentences.cn: 你的行动和你的原则形成反差.

sentences.en: Your price compare unfavorably with your competitor's.
sentences.cn: 与贵方的竞争敌手比拟,你们所报价格一点也不占优势.

words.tran_cn: 不宜的；令人不快的；不顺利的

trans.tran_cn: 不利地，不适宜地，反对地，令人不快地
